segments.text: I see the woman standing in a puddle of water, still drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how she hasn't noticed the water overflowing all around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, trying to get those cookies without her knowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to fall if he stretches any further.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool he's standing on looks so unstable, it's making me nervous just looking at it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, not noticing the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calm the scene looks outside the window, while inside it's pure chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still overflowing, and it's spreading across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I need to warn them, but I know they can't hear me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon and sees what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is a perfect example of how quickly things can go wrong when you're not paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR
